name: Mallet Special
author: kYSMIG
notes:
Mallet Story: Kept opening bacon savor / insight + spirits, so just said fuck it and put in a mallet. Draws felt smoother and I usually got Mallet when I needed it, also used it as Storm fodder sometimes.

https://youtu.be/FCABFPQtQak - Sam Skull Econ Otk combo + Mallet on my final match to KoG (versus random deck sadly)
